es.uvigo.darwin.prottest.selection
Class InformationCriterion

java.lang.Object
  es.uvigo.darwin.prottest.selection.InformationCriterion
Direct Known Subclasses:
AIC, AICc, BIC, DT, LNL
public abstract class InformationCriterion
extends java.lang.Object

Generic implementation of an information criterion for model selection. Model selection is used to model-averaging and estimate parameter importance in an evolutionary context after computing likelihood values for every model.

buildConfidenceInterval

public void buildConfidenceInterval()
Builds the confidence interval of selected models and their cumulative weight The model that just passed the confidence will be or not in the interval by chance (see below).
